item.title: MT2
item.description: Go back to the castle entrance Go back to the Compounds corridor Melanotan 2 Class: Peptide Form: Injectable Dosage unit: micrograms Application Tanning Increases [[insulin sensitivity]] Libido and [[sexuality functionality]] Phlebotomy / Blood prolifirators >- Increases ability to transport oxygen around the body Global/systemic stimulation of fat cell apoptosis Warning ⚠️ - If ran unchecked can increase risk of blood clotting / stroke / etc
